text: RT @NoahShachtman: For the past few months, @kalihollowayftw has been taking a look at what happened at The North Star, Shaun King's effort to revive a fabled abolitionist newspaper. King blamed problems there on over-ambition, but 7 former employees paint a darker picture. https://t.co/i7xas1A5yB
